item.description:
Thanks to everyone who came today and brought food, drinks, good cheer and lovely little dogs! I forgot to mention, too, that today was our FIFTH Anniversary of the Boston Maltese Meet.

Our next Boston Maltese Meet is going to be March 1st, Sunday, 11:30 am to 1:45 p m. There will NOT be a group before us that crowds our time (that happened this Sunday due to a miscommunication).

Maltese best,
Kim

group.name: The Boston Maltese and Tiny Dog Meetup Group

item.name: BOSTON MALTESE MEET, March 1st, Espec. for Pets, Sudbury, 11:30 am - 1:45 pm.
